00020 #ifndef RDK2_RMAPS_RVICTIMONMAP
00021 #define RDK2_RMAPS_RVICTIMONMAP
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/object/object.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/geometry/point.h>
00025 #include <rdkcore/container/container.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/rgraphics/color.h>
00027 #include <rdkcore/rgraphics/rimage.h>
00028 #include <rdkcore/rgeometry/rpoint2od.h>
00029 #include <rdkcore/rgeometry/rpoint2dvector.h>
00030 #include <rdkcore/rgraphics/color.h>
00031 #include <rdkcore/time/time.h>
00032 
00033 #include "ritemonmapvector.h"
00034 
00035 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00036     
00037 using RDK2::RGraphics::RgbColor;
00038 using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00039 using namespace RDK2::RGeometry;
00040 using namespace RDK2::RGraphics;
00041 using namespace RDK2::RPrimitive;
00042 using namespace RDK2::Time;
00043 
00044 struct RVictimOnMap : public RItemOnMap {
00045     RVictimOnMap();
00046     ~RVictimOnMap();
00047 
00048     Point2od pose;
00049     double zPosition;
00050 
00051     Point2od robotPose;
00052     RPoint2dVector pathToReach;
00053     
00054     bool confirmedOp, confirmedAI;          // operator or AI confirmed (or is sure it is a false positive)
00055     bool falsePositiveOp, falsePositiveAI;  // the victim is a false positive 
00056                                             // (the victim can either be confirmed XOR a false positive)
00057     double reliabilityOp, reliabilityAI;    // how much operator or AI is sure that it is a victim
00058     string idOp, idAI;                      // numeric tag or id of the victim ("John", "Bob", 10, 20, A, C, ecc.)
00059     string descriptionOp, descriptionAI;    // description (color, shape, etc.)
00060     string motionOp, motionAI;              // either True/False or Moving Appendages, etc.
00061     double temperatureOp, temperatureAI;    // use Celsius degrees
00062     string soundOp, soundAI;                // either True/False or kind of sound (voice, beacons, tapping)
00063     string situationOp, situationAI;        // situation is one among "Surface", "Trapped", "Void", "Entombed"
00064     string statusOp, statusAI;              // conscious or not
00065     string partsOp, partsAI;                // space separated list of parts seen 
00066                                             // (in USARSim can be "Head", "Arm", "Hand", "Chest", "Pelvis", "Leg", "Foot")
00067     vector<int> seenPartsCache;             // parts currently seen (to compute mean)
00068     double computeSeenPartsMean();
00069     
00070     Timestamp timestamp;                    // timestamp when the victim has been confirmed (robotPose is relative to this ts)
00071                         
00072     string getLogLine();                    // line in carmen format of the victim found
00073     
00074     RImage* snapshotOp;                     // snapshot of the victim taken by operator
00075     RImage* snapshotAI;                     // snapshot of the victim taken by AI
00076 
00077     vector<double> temperatureCache;        // used to compute temperature mean and variance
00078     vector<Point2od> poseCache;             // used to compute position mean and variance
00079     
00080     double computeTemperatureMean();
00081     Point2od computePoseMean();
00082     
00083     void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException);
00084     void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException);
00085     RDK2::Object* clone() const;      
00086 };
00087 
00088 }} // namespace
00089 
00090 #endif
